amendment.description: Amendment allows the Director of National Intelligence to provide grants to Hispanic-serving institutions of higher education for the purpose of offering advanced foreign language programs deemed in the immediate interest of the intelligence community and for study abroad and cultural immersion programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-155 to allow the Director of National Intelligence to provide grants to Hispanic-serving institutions of higher education for the purpose of offering advanced foreign language programs deemed in the immediate interest of the intelligence community and for study abroad and cultural immersion programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Crowley.
